data: `company_name:torqdesigns`;`company_slogan:WE BRINGYOUR IDEASTO LIFE.We offer top-notch services which are not only affordable but also value for money.`;`company_about:Empowering creativity through personalized design solutions, tailored to meet our clients' unique visions. We specialize in crafting bespoke designs that bring your ideas to life.`; `company_mission:to become a well-known business in India's technology and innovation industry.to help our clients achieve their business goals by providing them with high-quality, error-free solutions.`; `company_vision:We provide a wide range of services, including product development and content marketing, at reasonable rates which have been developed specifically for recently established companies.`; `company_values:We don’t stop at only comprehending the viewpoints of our customers. We show compassion and respect to both our clients and team members.`; `company_services: 1)PRODUCT DESIGN & DEVELOPMENT-Transforming concepts into remarkable products, your vision, our expertise. 1.1)CAE | CAD Modelling-We provide detailed 3D modeling and simulation services to enhance product design accuracy and streamline the development process for better outcomes. 1.2)Industrial Design- Our team creates innovative and functional industrial designs that combine aesthetics and usability, making products market-ready and user-friendly. 1.3)Reverse Engineering- We transform existing products into accurate 3D models, enabling analysis, improvements, and reproduction for better performance and efficiency. 1.4)Product Engineering- From initial concept to final production, we offer comprehensive product engineering services to ensure your product is reliable and manufacturable. 1.5)Rapid Prototyping- Our rapid prototyping services quickly bring your ideas to life, allowing for efficient testing, refinement, and faster market entry.  2)Innovation & Tech -Empowering Innovation, Circuit by Circuit 3)Web Development-Start strong with a website designed to grow your new business. Simple, effective, and ready to launch. 3.1)Website Design and Development-Essential for any modern business, our website design and development services ensure your online presence is professional, accessible, and ready to grow with you. 3.2)E-commerce Solutions-Unlock the full potential of your online store with our e-commerce solutions, designed to streamline operations, enhance customer experience, and boost sales. 3.3)Mobile App Development- Transform your ideas into mobile reality with our app development services, tailored to deliver seamless, user-friendly experiences on any device. 3.4)Search Engine Optimization (SEO) - Boost your visibility and attract more traffic with our SEO strategies, crafted to enhance your rankings and connect you with your ideal audience. 3.5)Web Maintenance and Support- Keep your website optimal and error-free with our maintenance and support services, ensuring reliability and peak performance around the clock. 3.6)API Integration and Development- Seamlessly connect your systems and enhance functionality with our API integration and development services, tailored for robust and scalable solutions. 3.7)Web Hosting and Domain Services: Secure and reliable web hosting and domain services to ensure your website is always accessible, fast, and protected. 3.8)UX/UI Design : Craft engaging and intuitive user experiences with our UX/UI design services, tailored to captivate and retain your audience. 4)GRAPHIC DESIGN- XX Design Company is a leading design firm renowned for its visionary creativity- 4.1)Photo Design 4.2)Logo Design 4.3)Social Media 4.4)Photo Restoration 4.5)UI/UX 4.6)Illustrations 4.7)Infographic Design. 5)3D PRINTING- Transforming Ideas into Reality: Your Imagination, Our Innovation – Precision in Every Layer. 5.1)Broken Parts- Restoring Brilliance: Beyond Printing, We Mend. Expert 3D Printing Services with a Touch of Precision, mending broken parts and reimagining possibilities. 5.2)Plastic Manufacturing - Explore the Future of Manufacturing with our Advanced 3D Printing. From Prototypes to Production, we mold your ideas into high-quality plastic creations, setting new standards in innovation and efficiency.`; `company_product:1)STEM DIY KITS- Where Learning Meets Fun! step1) WATCH-  Experience the magic as our kits come to life! Dive into interactive videos that showcase the fun and educational value of each project. step2) BUILD - Each kit is a stepping stone to greater confidence and critical skills. Witness your child's abilities flourish as they tackle new challenges. step3)PLAY- Discover the practical side of STEM learning. Our kits introduce real-world applications in a way that's engaging and directly interactive. step4)LEARN- Transform education into an adventure! Hands-on experiments not only teach vital skills but also ignite a lasting passion for learning.`; `company_contact- email:torqdesigns@gmail.com, phone:+91 9449610077
